entry.title: Try Flutter
entry.content:
Get started

  • get SDK ğŸ‘‰Flutter SDK releases
  • update system path
  • update user path
  • flutter doctor
  • ğŸ‘‰Android Studio

First Go

  • code ./ open by vscode
  • flutter doctor re-examined
  • flutter emulator check emulator
  • flutter emulators --launch Pixel_3a_API_30_x86 run the emulator
